alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 7:26PM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Spring Mountains and Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will be possible especially downwind of Mt Charleston and within the Red Rock loop.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
